description:
Mahmut infiltrates Hisar with Shara. The citizens of Hisar have been captured by the Araba Tribe and Louis` private army, the Röd Orm. In an attempt to rescue the citizens and stop the rebellion, Mahmut lures out the Röd`s commanding officer. However, the officer uses a hostage as a shield to protect himself, and Mahmut is put on the back foot. Only Shara will be able to turn things around.
Source: amazon
